statements: SELECT * FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE disease_type = 'Flu'
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis_date FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY diagnosis_date DESC
SELECT patient_name, spread_pattern FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE diagnosis_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT patient_name, location FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE disease_type = 'COVID-19' ORDER BY location, diagnosis_date
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, location FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE spread_pattern = 'Community Transmission'
SELECT patient_name, disease_type, diagnosis_date FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE disease_type = 'Flu' ORDER BY diagnosis_date DESC
SELECT * FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE location = 'New York' AND diagnosis_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, disease_type, location FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE disease_type IN ('COVID-19', 'Influenza')
SELECT DISTINCT disease_type FROM DiseaseOutbreaks
SELECT patient_name, location, spread_pattern FROM DiseaseOutbreaks ORDER BY location, spread_pattern DESC
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, age, location FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT outbreak_id, disease_name, date_start FROM Outbreaks ORDER BY date_start DESC;
SELECT patient_name, location, gender FROM Patients WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM Outbreaks WHERE date_end > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT patient_name, gender, location FROM Patients WHERE location = 'City A'
SELECT disease_name, date_start, date_end FROM Outbreaks WHERE date_start >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_start DESC
SELECT patient_name, gender, age, location FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 40
SELECT * FROM Outbreaks WHERE location <> 'Hospital X'
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, name, age FROM Patients WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT diagnosis, age FROM Patients WHERE age > 40 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM Disease WHERE severity_level = 'High' ORDER BY disease_name ASC;
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM Treatments WHERE cost < 500 ORDER BY cost ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT disease_name, symptoms, severity_level FROM Disease WHERE severity_level = 'High';
SELECT DISTINCT city FROM Patients ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT p.name, d.disease_name, t.treatment_name FROM Patients p INNER JOIN Disease d ON p.diagnosis = d.disease_name INNER JOIN Treatments t ON d.disease_name = t.treatment_name ORDER BY p.age ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, name, age FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT diagnosis_date, COUNT(*) FROM Diagnoses GROUP BY diagnosis_date ORDER BY diagnosis_date DESC;
SELECT Patients.name, Symptoms.symptom_name FROM Patients INNER JOIN Diagnoses ON Patients.patient_id = Diagnoses.patient_id INNER JOIN Symptoms ON Diagnoses.symptom_id = Symptoms.symptom_id;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM Patients ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT name, age, location FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT Patients.name, Symptoms.symptom_name FROM Patients INNER JOIN Diagnoses ON Patients.patient_id = Diagnoses.patient_id INNER JOIN Symptoms ON Diagnoses.symptom_id = Symptoms.symptom_id
SELECT * FROM Diagnoses WHERE diagnosis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY diagnosis_date DESC

SELECT Patients.name, Treatment.treatment_type, Treatment.treatment_description FROM Patients INNER JOIN Diagnoses ON Patients.patient_id = Diagnoses.patient_id INNER JOIN Treatment ON Diagnoses.diagnosis_id = Treatment.diagnosis_id
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_name, location FROM Patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM Treatments WHERE cost < 100.00;
SELECT disease_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM Outbreaks WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Diagnoses WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY diagnosis_date;
SELECT patient_name, gender, location FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT disease_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM Outbreaks WHERE disease_name='COVID-19' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT symptom_name FROM Symptoms WHERE symptom_name IN ('Cough', 'Fever', 'Fatigue') ORDER BY symptom_name ASC;
